== Usage ==

== Values ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `bgcolor` attribute on the following elements:

  * [BodyElement <body>]
  * [ColElement <col>]
  * [ColgroupElement <colgroup>]
  * [IlayerElement <ilayer>]
  * [LayerElement <layer>]
  * [MarqueeElement <marquee>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
  * [TbodyElement <tbody>]
  * [TdElement <td>]
  * [ThElement <th>]
  * [TfootElement <tfoot>]
  * [TheadElement <thead>]
  * [TrElement <tr>]
